I think the class is quite interesting; however, teacher should cover various topics and issues in the class rather than the field he is interested in. And I don't think my speaking skill has been well trained in this course.
老師上課很有趣，以遊戲和同學互動的方式讓我們學習口說，The best and the funnest oral training class I've take!
老師用心設計活動提升學習動機，但課前課後需進行的準備或作業繁複，課堂上會有一些與口訓不完全相關的活動，整體來說課堂進行是相當有活力有樂趣，讓學生在不同情境下運用口語表達，但雜事非常多。
不要在最後五天前才把期末影片需要的元素給我們

Sometimes I don't feel like we are actually practicing our English-speaking skills, but that may be due to the students who are not trying to hone their skills...?
Thank you for this semester.
